text: Trans World Airlines (TWA) was one of the largest airlines of the United States. It stopped flying after it was bought by American Airlines in 2001, after many financial problems. ==References== == Gallery == File:TWA Sunken lounge (Quintin Soloviev).jpg|The TWA Hotel File:Wreckage TWA 800.jpg|The wreckage of TWA Flight 800 File:Boeing 707-331, Trans World Airlines - TWA AN0575882.jpg|A Boeing 707 File:McDonnell Douglas MD-82, Trans World Airlines (TWA) JP6356069.jpg|A McDonnell Douglas MD-90 File:Lockheed L-1011-385-1-15 TriStar 100, Trans World Airlines - TWA AN0792126.jpg|A Lockheed Tristar File:TWA Boeing 747-100 N93119 Marmet.jpg|A Boeing 747 File:Lockheed L-1049G Super Constellation, Trans World Airlines (TWA) JP5935356.jpg|A Lockheed Constellation ==Other Information== Category:Airlines of the United States Category:1925 establishments in the United States Category:2001 disestablishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Fort Worth, Texas
title: Trans World Airlines
